text:
Instagram: back the number of likes under some posts! (photo)
Time for more tests at Instagram?
07 Nov 2019, 12:23 by Enrico Paccusse
We do not know the official reasons, nor if the choice is final, yet one thing is certain: the number of likes on Instagram is coming back (see the attached screenshot).
The counting appears only in some circumstances, not easy to identify, but we can say with certainty since we have seen it on one of our devices.
We remind you that the Instagram experiment started more than a month ago, with Facebook following immediately after. This last news seems to be a further test to understand if the user's perception (and the interaction with the post) can change depending on the number of likes I like on a specific post. How will it end? Hard to say. In the meantime, let us know if you too have returned to see the count.



4 ðŸ“· go to the photo gallery
